website_summaries.verdict: This rustic table is well-built and a fraction of the price of its competitors.
pros: An affordable table that holds up well and is a great value
The cherry finish is convincing, and the wrought iron frame makes for a great rustic style piece
Measures 47.2 inches wide by 17 inches deep by 30.4 inches high
cons: The instructions are difficult to follow, making assembly a challenge

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the worst thing I’ve ever put together. It was missing some screws and missing holes where they were clearly needed. And of course it was towards the end of the assembly. I had to drill extra holes myself and get extra screws. I needed a table for a special weekend and there was no time to go out and get a different one. It looks great standing in my entry way but it’s crap. The fake wood decals didn’t even meet in the corners all the way. I’ve put together a ton of these things and never had any issues like I have with this one.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Beware, they peel and bubble
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed... The top of the table peel very quickly. I have been very careful with any moisture that has come in contact. (Examples cold drinks,fresh cut flowers in vase etc) I will say they are sturdy and nice looking. I haven't used these for a full year with careful use. Be aware these are great if you plan to just look at them. Would I purchase these again, that would be No. The surface peels and scratches very easily. Except where it's bubbled and peeled away the still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: poor fitting holes
customer_reviews.text: I've put a ton of stuff together over the years, and this was one of the worse. There's about a 3/4 " gap between the bottom of the drawers and the wood underneath. One of these days I'm going to redrill holes. The top piece was a disaster, also. I ended up using a rubber mallet to get the pegs to go into the predrilled holes.If I wasn't already committed to this set, I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Bella's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Value - Takes a While to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I received the table and assembled it last night. The box was extremely efficiently packed and beware, it's heavy. But that's a good thing. I'm an engineer, so assembling things is a strength of mine, but be prepared to spend at least two hours putting this together. The directions were excellent; I've got to compliment the technical writers at the company. *NOTE* Pay close attention to their directions! You will save time if you carefully read each instruction not having to disassemble portions and re-do them correctly. The finished product looks great and will serve the purpose I purchased it for very well. I'm pleased with the quality and the price, and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Eckert

customer_reviews.title: I love this furniture!
customer_reviews.text: I have the matching desk and file cabinet. I use the "sofa table" as an extension to my desk, making an "L" with the two. This is gorgeous furniture for the price. All pieces assemble easily and are very sturdy. The color is great and there are caps on the legs to protect my new wood floor. Very, very satisfied with Sauder quality.
customer_reviews.author: mikki1006

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed and documented.  Easily assembled.
customer_reviews.text: Putting furniture together is never a breeze. This table was very easy to assemble, well documented instructions and parts labeled well. Very solid construction and nice laminate look. Works great for my 3D printer workstation. Would recommend this to everyone. After 2 years and 2 heavy 3D printers on top and 30 boxes of plastic on the bottom shelf, the table began to sag. So the addition of wooden spacers were installed on the bottom. 2 weeks later the table has gone back to its original shape. A great table for everything and very stylish. Recommend a BUY
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Value- a great table!
customer_reviews.text: This table is really really nice. For the price, it can't be beat! It took me about 3 hours to put together. Some of the pieces were missing their letter label but I was able to figure it out as the pictures and instructions were awesome. This is not a flimsy piece, the boards are about an inch thick. I had no scratches or dents of any kind and the drawers took a few minutes to align, following the directions. Mine blends in nicely with my reddish/brown wood work. It's classy looking with a bit of rustic flair. I would buy from this line again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Koetke

customer_reviews.title: The directions are spot on and very detailed... just a lot of parts
customer_reviews.text: This table is heavy and very sturdy. My only complaint is that it was like building it from scratch... you literally even construct the drawers from pieces provided. All in all minus the pain of putting it together (took me about 1.5 hours) it is an amazing table. The directions are spot on and very detailed... just a lot of parts.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: No more Sauder for me!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased and assembled many Sauder items over the years; however, none have been of such poor quality and difficult to assemble as this one. Holes were not in proper alignment; the bottom of one of the doors was cracked, the back of the table was broken and their was a hairline crack in the top of the table! I assembled and notified the company who kindly offered to send me replacement parts. What they didn't mention is their note in the instructions that, because of the glue, it is nearly impossible to disassemble the table once put together! So...what good would replacement parts do!? No more Sauder for me!
customer_reviews.author: rmiller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Table!
customer_reviews.text: My husband searched high and low for the perfect table for our space...he was not going to settle! It took MONTHS to find this table and he highly anticipated it's arrival on our doorstep! when it arrived, he carefully unpacked the parts and carefully checked them against the parts list and then set to work on assembly! I must say, he did well!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hohenberger

customer_reviews.title: I love the finish and how it looks in the living ...
customer_reviews.text: First, I love the finish and how it looks in the living room, and it was fairly easy to assemble. That said, the only critical comment I can make is that the drawers are a little funky--they don't close tight. Now, that may be my fault, as I'm not sure I installed the hardware properly, however, it is not so noticable that I want to dismantle the entire table to make the drawers fit and the drawers function properly. I would recommend this product to others with the caveat that they have a little better than beginner assembly skills.
customer_reviews.author: treasa

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but it doesn't look as good ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but it doesn't look as good in reality as it does in the picture. In a well lit spot it would look cheap, but it is perfect for our needs (at the top of a poorly lit landing). My husband put it together and there was certainly some colorful language, but nothing unusual! All in all, a good purchase but I would probably think twice about buying any other products from this company simply because returning an item of this heft would be really expensive and a huge hassle. So, you'd be pretty stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer v

customer_reviews.title: I would pass on these products
customer_reviews.text: Garbage!! Unless you want to cry for several hours trying to get the pieces to stay together, don’t do it. Oh and the drawers?? Leave them closed unless you want to keep putting the front of the drawer on each time. I would LOVE to return all 3 Souder products I purchased for my home. Looks nice once assembled, that’s it. Only the top and shelf on bottom are usable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bayne

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Shipping box had GLUE everywhere that I tracked into my house on my FLOORS and table was dented in two areas and then needed touching up at bottom on both sides. I want to send it back but my husband took 3 1/2 hours putting it together
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: This table is much higher quality than most build-yourself furniture. It was easy to assemble and very sturdy after it was built. I really like the metal caps on the legs. I wish the drawers were a bit longer, or pulled out a bit more, but that's not a flaw of the table itself. It's very attractive and very versatile. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: not sure why its so heavy
customer_reviews.text: Obviously it comes in a box with a million pieces. Its appears a bit smaller than I imagined. The drawers are the biggest disappointment. The drawers were really cheap material. I thought originally to put silverware in them but instead I will use sponges. They give you Elmer's glue and for good reason. You will need it. Or better yet Gorilla glue.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: The Sofa Table looks great. It is well constructed but takes a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: The Sofa Table looks great. It is well constructed but takes a lot of time to assemble. Once it is assembled it very solid. It has a lot of nice detail. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: David Firebaugh

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for the money
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful, no doubt, but keep in mind the lower price because that means it is not all real wood. Much of it is pressed particle board and veneers. That being said, once assembled, they are sturdy, well made, and of substantial size. The assembly is not easy, the instructions had some confusing parts, but all in all not too bad. The table took one man 2 hours to build.
customer_reviews.author: Miz V

customer_reviews.title: Not as Sturdy as it looks
customer_reviews.text: The table has great looks but is a lengthy assembly. The drawers are very weak and I would not suggest relying on it to hold much. Looks great but not functional enough for me. Wish I had kept looking!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as it looks
customer_reviews.text: Directions were pretty easy but pay close attention because some sides of parts are not easily known when building and caused a major hiccup when I completed after everything was glued. Drawer alignment was not easy either and looks weird after completion.
customer_reviews.author: I. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Living room table for my pictures
customer_reviews.text: Love this addition to my room. I eliminated a bookcase but had no where for my pictures now so I bought this and it works perfectly for the room.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kinder

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together, a beautiful entryway table by sauder. im a huge sauder furniture fan.....beautiful furniture that last for years at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Chele

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. The drawers aren't even, the instructions are not clear, everything is not all labeled, and much darker laminate (pressboard). It took my fiancé and I two hours to assemble. Can't return, because we put it all together and don't have time to take apart and put back in box.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Camarena

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for the price
customer_reviews.text: This table went together very nicely. The quality/finish is not as nice in real life as it looks in the photo, but it is serving very nicely as a tv stand in our guest room. We wanted something with drawers for a guest to put their wallet and keys, etc. and the shelf below for their bags, etc. It is doing a remarkable job.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: Love my new console table! It looks so much nicer than I was expecting and the quality is very good. Very sturdy and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sofa table
customer_reviews.text: Great sofa table! We bought this along with the end tables and coffee table. The set looks great in our living room! Assembly was a little more difficult on this unit. You need to pay attention to each step and don't try to wing it! Other than the assembly, it is a great item! I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: So in love <3
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to assemble...about a 1.5 hours. The wood on this table in absolutely beautiful, and everything about it is just beyond perfect in every way! This may be my new favorite piece in the house!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Sauder Carson Forge Sofa Table, Washington Cherry finish
customer_reviews.text: Slow assembly for old man but, beautiful results, love it, good buy
customer_reviews.author: Randall K. Geiser

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the price was great and it was exactly what I was looking for. It took about 5 hours to assemble but it wasn’t too hard. It came with a huge crack on the corner and is not the sturdiest. The drawers do not roll smoothly either. If it weren’t for the huge crack in the corner I would have really loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service ever
customer_reviews.text: Best customer service ever.This, and other Sauder prodicts are beautifully and easy to assemble made. Two small parts were missed, and when we called them they sent them right away because we received the package within 2 days. Just awesome. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: NatalKaK

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with the product, I love the final look. I hasted before buying it because some of some reviews stated that it wasn’t very well made, I’m glad I made the choice of going for it. If you follow the instructions there should be no problem at all, do take the time to read the instructions, it’s very important. Nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: This item is made entirely of particle board or mdf. Took about 4 hours to assemble but all the parts were in the box....even all the odd nuts and bolts were there. the instructions could use some improvement but proved adequate if you were patient and read carefully. The assembled unit looks good but know it isn't real wood. Then again what can you expect for the price. Overall a good value and came well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Quality product you won’t regret
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Has some weight to it so you know it’s sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kishele Hale

customer_reviews.title: If you like FAUX stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Great design but made from cheap very cheap compressed board with a photographic type finish. I immediately replaced the top with real wood. It looks much better and it did not add much to the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Pietro A. Barbieri

customer_reviews.title: Looks like High end piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Looks like High end piece of furniture. Perfect in my entry way. This is my 4th Sauder furniture project. The instructions are very well written & easy to assemble if followed. I'm looking forward to my next Sauder project. As a woman very pleased that can build my own furniture..Hear Me Roar,
customer_reviews.author: D. davis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Table!!
customer_reviews.text: This table is pretty heavy!!! I was able to put it together myself with no problems and very pleased with the results. It looks great in my entrance.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality and great instructions
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy piece of furniture. Takes a while to put together, but it was rather therapeutic. The instructions are some of the best instructions I've ever received with piece of furniture. Take the time to read the instructions, it's very important. Those who had issues with uneven drawers should look at step 18. They have a nifty drawer adjustment slider to even out the drawers. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Caggy

customer_reviews.title: ... but it's heavier and the accents make it look like a more expensive piece
customer_reviews.text: Up close it's obviously particle board but it's heavier and the accents make it look like a more expensive piece. I would be happy to purchase other items in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Anne V.

customer_reviews.title: ... do not come out as much as I would like but otherwise I love it
customer_reviews.text: The drawers do not come out as much as I would like but otherwise I love it! There were some minor scratches when it arrived but nothing in a noticeable area.
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and darker than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy good quality furniture but The top of mine has a small fracture in the bottom right corner . Additionally the wood is darker than shown in the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but IT'S BROKE ALL THE WAY THROUGH
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but IT'S BROKE ALL THE WAY THROUGH. Top part has a giant crack from one end to the other. It's almost as if the people delivering just chunked it around. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn MacAllister

customer_reviews.title: great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I expected. I didn’t measure because the price was so good I thought it would be smaller. Unfortunately it’s too big for my entry which is where I intended to use it
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase. Super easy assembly, good looking coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Was able to fully assemble in minutes. Looks good. Fairly sturdy
customer_reviews.author: David Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Solid Piece
customer_reviews.text: Good table, get ready for some serious building. It's not complicated but quite time consuming when compared to older projects. Looks great though!
customer_reviews.author: Tony M. Calkins

customer_reviews.title: Missing peaces but still love it
customer_reviews.text: I have several pieces this style. This was the only one that was missing parts. There is suppose to be a black metal frame around the peace on the lower back. But I didn't get it. I just sat it were you can't really see that part
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to assemble but it looks great and perfect for storing my laptop in the drawer
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Pink

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Cracked on me mid-installation. A lot of the pieces already had chips and scratches as I removed them from the packaging. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. Takes two to assemble easily. 2 screws missing for right drawer. Company replaced. However, right drawer still does not fit correctly. Also, does not pull out without jerking. Only disappointment! I highly recommend. If only they could get the drawer situation worked out. Price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy A.

customer_reviews.title: Have patience putting assembling!
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful addition to our living room! It does take a couple of hours to put together though. Quality product very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Part A fit fine. Part B doesn't have the holes drilled correctly
customer_reviews.text: so far i guess its ok. arrived intact. but the "Part B" end piece is the wrong one. Part A fit fine. Part B doesn't have the holes drilled correctly, at least that is my perception. i contact Amazon request a new Part B replacement. sure if i didn't it wrong, let me know
customer_reviews.author: neutrino

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever to assemble!!
customer_reviews.text: It looks decent and but isn't the greatest quality, and takes forever to put together! Be prepared for an Ikea-like situation, so if, like me, you are not the handiest person, you may, like me, end up with the drawers slightly off and no way to fix them. As I was trying to make an adjustment, some of the fake wood tore a bit so I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Take you r time and read the instructions
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking and sturdy table, but it takes a genius to put together all the pieces - we made one mistake, but saved the marriage by finally getting the drawer slides correctly lined up.
customer_reviews.author: W.B

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: Love the design of the table. However, it was hard to assemble. Drawers didn't line up. Too many issues with it so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together and looks like higher priced furniture I purchased numerous pieces of this brand
customer_reviews.author: Dar

customer_reviews.title: not a good
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to assemble if you are not handy. Some parts warped, but it is not visible until it's assembled, not a good buy
customer_reviews.author: a wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking table
customer_reviews.text: So far I have no complaints about this table. It went together easily (besides putting the top on. You will need to people for this and take your time), don't get me wrong it took me about an hour, but I took my time and wanted it to look really good. It looks great for my needs. I would recommend this table to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Sofa Table!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking and solid piece of furniture once it's assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Kube

customer_reviews.title: I love this table fits perfect in my living room and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this table fits perfect in my living room and pairs with the other tables I've purchased through Amazon (end and coffee tables)
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Muniz

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for the location I needed to fill
customer_reviews.author: Diane C.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this table
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this table. So much better than what I expected. Good quality and sturdy!!! Fits perfect in my foyer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Vitera

customer_reviews.title: This is great table for entry way
customer_reviews.text: This is great table for entry way. It will take a couple of hours to assemble. Instructions are good, and parts are well labeled. Caution will scratch easy be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase and wotks great under my 50" ...
customer_reviews.text: I was somewhat overwhelmed at the thought of putting it together, but it was worth the finished product. Very happy with my purchase and wotks great under my 50" TV. Same length, looks Great!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Larson

customer_reviews.title: Hooray for Sauder
customer_reviews.text: You cannot go wrong with Sauder. I have purchased many things made by them and it's well designed, sturdy and functional. I have the whole office set which looks attractive and didn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: msauve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This table is exactly what I wanted. It is perfect and I love it. Putting it together was easy except for putting on the top -- I had to call for help on that part. Otherwise, a piece of cake. And, it was delivered to my home free of charge because of Amazon Prime. Life is good!
customer_reviews.author: sharlene

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Solid, good looking piece. I use it under TV. Only it's more brown in reality. Not too much red. Still looks good
customer_reviews.author: Lubica Simon

customer_reviews.title: I would buy similar furniture that matches this.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table! Easy to put together! Looks as good as the picture!
customer_reviews.author: Woodland1354

customer_reviews.title: It’s a nice table just keep in mind you get what you ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice table just keep in mind you get what you pay for...heavy weight instructions leave something to be desired
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our purchase, it shipped quickly and is packaged well. Assembly took about 2 hours but the materials are good and the table is very sturdy and looks just like the picture. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria H.

customer_reviews.title: Built it solo in two hours.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it should cost much more. Clear instruction with little jokes to boot. I love this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Robinson

customer_reviews.title: but can't beat the price and looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Table is exactly what I expected. Took about 2 1/2 hours to put together by myself. Not furniture that would survive a move, but can't beat the price and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jl Ferels

customer_reviews.title: Sofa Table nice touch
customer_reviews.text: Nice touch for my guest room. Fast shipping and easy assembly. Good quality for this type of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: RobertM

customer_reviews.title: Looks great once together
customer_reviews.text: A LOT of pieces but well worth it. Looks great once together.
customer_reviews.author: DRWeaver

customer_reviews.title: for the money it’s a great value. I use the shelf to prop my ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a desk, for the money it’s a great value. I use the shelf to prop my feet on and it’s the right height. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Trook33

customer_reviews.title: good quality, needs two people to put together
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for the living room, good quality, needs two people to put together, although it is simple to assemble. no damage to table when delivered . Will buy from this manufacturer again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table. It was a little scratched although not ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. It was a little scratched although not a big deal. Very easy to build. I have it behind me at my office and it looks great. I get a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than it is
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my entry way. It is a great style and was hoping to love it. But, it is a pain to put together and is cheaply made. All in all, would probably not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: bossy boots

customer_reviews.title: Super super heavy
customer_reviews.text: Super super heavy! High quality! The right hand drawer is not as level as the left hand drawer. Hard to tell though. We originally bought the TV stand... wanted to match it .. and found this whole set!... Looks amazing great!
customer_reviews.author: NICK H.

customer_reviews.title: Beware it’s not solid wood ,, very cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality ,, It’s not solid wood as they wrote on commercial, It’s just cheap wood covered with walnut wood cover ,,
customer_reviews.author: akram

customer_reviews.title: More than what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great table for any office, home, or any other fill-up space furniture. I am using in office for coffee tables, and it is far more than what I expected. Bit confused and difficult when you are installing but worth of times and efforts! Great furniture. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Shin

customer_reviews.title: ... in my opinion but it is still a really nice piece! Easy to put together but comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: Just a little bit over priced in my opinion but it is still a really nice piece! Easy to put together but comes with so many pieces and screws that it took my husband an hour to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap! came in a million pieces. My husband ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap! came in a million pieces. My husband is very handy and it took him and my teenager 2.5hrs to put together. The drawer bottom doesn't stay in because the drawer was made incorrectly without a slit for the drawer to slide into.
customer_reviews.author: speedracer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece for my foyer. Stable e great Quality
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Looks good for a "not real wood"
customer_reviews.text: Looks good for a "not real wood". Pretty easy to assemble. It took a couple of hours. Directions are easy to follow and all the parts were included.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying 3 of these and may buy another. Super super gorgeous in our home. For the quality and look... definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Smeekel

customer_reviews.title: Seems like the drawer design could have been better
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a chip on the top piece. Drawers do not work very well at all. Not smooth opening, very rough and jaggedy. Seems like the drawer design could have been better. Very sturdy though.
customer_reviews.author: RedBeard

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Nice table. The drawers work good although they do not line up with each other. After several attempts at adjusting I will live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori4AU

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a 40 inch TV, antenna, DVD player and sound bar. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LynnD

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Another gem! The quality of this item for the price was a bit surprising. More sturdy than i thought and looks truly amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Keyser

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions
customer_reviews.text: This console table was as promised. There’s a lot of pieces but the directions were easy to use. I was satisfied with the end result!
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda

customer_reviews.title: Love this console
customer_reviews.text: Love this console! Made well and easy to put together. Everyone compliments me on it. Product was exactly what I ordered and arrived when it said it would. Would buy from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: LoveBug5

customer_reviews.title: The pre drilled holes were not consistent with the instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: The pre drilled holes were not consistent with the instructions. I had to request a replacement and found that too had issues with the holes. Ultimately had to mix and match between both packages to get the furniture properly assembled.

customer_reviews.text: Very nice table looks great behind my couch. Came in lots of pieces but not to hard to put together

customer_reviews.title: it still looks really good though! i don't think it would stand up ...
customer_reviews.text: i expected it to be solid wood but it is compressed wood. it still looks really good though! i don't think it would stand up to a beating and by that i mean if you move a lot be very careful with it because any ding or scratch will not look good and it is an easy fix.

product_meta.title: Sauder Carson Forge Sofa Table, Washington Cherry finish
product_meta.description: Sofa meet table. This sofa table from the Carson Forge collection is the perfect addition to your living room. It features two drawers that open and close on smooth metal runners, great for storing magazines, crossword puzzles, reading glasses, you name it. It also includes a lower shelf for additional storage and display. With its Washington Cherry finish and wrought iron style hardware, this versatile table will make any room feel a little rustic.
feature_bullets: Drawers feature metal runners and safety stops
Lower shelf for additional storage or display
Wrought iron style hardware and accents
Finished on all sides for versatile placement
Quick and easy assembly with patented T-lock drawer system

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars236 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
